title: Playstream-Engine
tagline: video streaming engine that allows users to stream live video content to multiple viewers with low latency and high quality.

title: Web-based Vulnerability Scanner
tagline: A lightweight web scanner that detects common security issues in web applications and displays detailed scan results in a clean, user-friendly interface.

title: Face Recognition Attendance System
tagline: An automated attendance tool that marks presence by detecting faces via webcam feed.
